Italy's Meloni and allies keep control of Abruzzo regionItalian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni and her right-wing allies have kept control of the central region of Abruzzo, election results on Monday showed, bouncing back from a shock defeat in Sardinia two weeks ago. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 07:02:25 GMT T7PL6PQ6NJK3HLSLUB4C4ZWV2I https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italy-meloni-allies-keep-control-abruzzo-region-2024-03-11/Reuters世界欧洲
Head of Pakistan's biggest bank to lead finance ministry, sources sayThe CEO of Pakistan's largest bank was appointed as a federal minister, according to a government document seen by Reuters, and sources said he was likely to be appointed Finance Minister as the South Asian nation looks to tide over a troubling time for its economy. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 06:41:35 GMT FWNX3BUSYBPF7GSFXNGDJ2WNDU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/head-pakistan-largest-bank-lead-finance-ministry-sources-say-2024-03-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
24 injured after 'technical problem' on LATAM Sydney-Auckland flight, NZ Herald reportsTwenty-four people were injured after a "technical problem" caused strong movement on a LATAM Airlines flight from Sydney to Auckland, the New Zealand Herald reported on Monday. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 06:39:30 GMT TWTBPE6NJVJPDIT2EKDYCDFGFQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/24-injured-after-technical-problem-latam-sydney-auckland-flight-nz-herald-2024-03-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
Russia says pope's appeal on Ukraine war is to the WestRussia said Pope Francis's call for talks with Moscow to end the war in Ukraine was a request to Kyiv's Western allies to abandon their ambition to defeat Russia and to recognise the West's mistake in the Ukraine war, Italy's ANSA news agency reported. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 06:31:25 GMT UBNXH6LFBNIH3HCWBXCYZHERKI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-popes-appeal-ukraine-war-is-west-2024-03-11/Reuters世界欧洲
Ukraine's Oscar winning director says he would exchange his award for no warUkrainian director Mstyslav Chernov, who on Sunday won the first Academy Award for his country for the "20 Days in Mariupol" documentary about the Russian siege of the port city, said he would rather have no Oscar and no war waged against his country. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 06:26:35 GMT E2ODOAQDCJID5KVCBYPMMMUBNM https://www.reuters.com/lifestyle/ukrainian-oscar-looking-director-says-he-would-exchange-his-award-no-war-2024-03-11/Reuters生活方式
Five of six missing skiers found dead in Switzerland, police sayFive cross-country skiers who went missing during a ski tour in Switzerland were found dead, while a search was still on for the sixth skier, police said in a statement on Monday. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 05:02:17 GMT CELFSGH2KNIWRCBOHTLC7MKZP4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Five-cross-country-skiers-found-dead-switzerland-afp-reports-2024-03-11/Reuters世界欧洲
US-bound ship from Reliance's Sikka port hits BPCL crude import facility, sources sayOil tanker Hafnia Seine bound for the United States from Sikka port in Western India hit Bharat Petroleum Corp's (BPCL) crude import facility in an accident late on Sunday, two sources with the knowledge of the matter said on Monday. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 04:10:19 GMT ITK足球ZLGZGJTPSYFRLFYM4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/us-bound-ship-reliances-silver-port-hits-bpcl-crude-import-facility-sources-say-2024-03-11/Nidhi Verma商业活力
Universal Pictures dominates the Academy Awards with 'Oppenheimer'Comcast Corp's Universal Pictures dominated Sunday's Academy Awards, propelled by the historical drama "Oppenheimer," which won seven Oscars, including best picture. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 03:43:03 GMT 4K2G374465PILORUXVCEA7RKDI https://www.reuters.com/lifestyle/universal-pictures-dominates-academy-awards-with-oppenheimer-2024-03-11/Dawn Chmielewski生活方式
South Korea deploys military, public doctors to strike-hit hospitalsSouth Korea will start deploying military physicians and doctors from public health centres to strike-hit hospitals on Monday to help care for patients affected by the walkout of nearly 12,000 trainee doctors from 100 hospitals over government reform plans. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 03:37:57 GMT TP4SWLI3L5MBBFEAMZVDFVOSWE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-deploys-military-public-doctors-strike-hit-hospitals-2024-03-11/Hyunsu Yim商业工作世界
China trying to 'normalise' military drills near Taiwan: island's top security officialTaiwan's top security official told parliament on Monday that China runs "joint combat readiness patrols" near the democratic island every 7-10 days on average, saying Chinese forces were trying to "normalise" drills near Taiwan. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 02:48:53 GMT 7Q7GIMPQFJKGJEI7334JB23CKE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-trying-to-normalise-military-drills-near-taiwan-islands-top-security-official-2024-03-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
Australian writer sentenced to death in China may never be executed, says Chinese ambassadorChina's ambassador to Australia said on Monday that the suspended death sentence given last month to imprisoned Australian writer Yang Hengjun may not be carried out if the former pro-democracy blogger commits no further crimes. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 02:38:12 GMT校准3ASIO7ZLHMPXA4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australian-writer-sentenced-death-china-may-never-be-executed-says-chinese-2024-03-11/Lewis Jackson世界亚太地区
